type.name: item_shape_or_shape_element_select
type.description: This extends the assignment of a property to an item shape or a shape element.

type.name: shape_property_assignment
type.description: This extends the assignment of properties to Item_shape, Shape_element, and Shape_element_relationship.

type.name: shape_select
type.description: This selects between shapes and elements of shape, and can be extended.

entity.name: Assembly_component_shape
entity.description: An Assembly_component_shape specifies the shape of a component in the context of an assembly.

entity.name: Item_shape
entity.description: An Item_shape specifies the shape of an item.

entity.name: Property_of_shape
entity.description: A Property_of_shape specifies a property associated to a shape.

entity.name: Shape_element
entity.description: A Shape_element specifies a portion of shape that has to be identified explicitly to be associated with other information.

explicit.name: description
explicit.description: specifies additional information about the Shape_element.

explicit.name: composition
explicit.description: specifies the Item_shape that the Shape_element is part of.

explicit.name: element_name
explicit.description: specifies the word or group of words by which the Shape_element is referred to.

entity.name: Shape_element_relationship
entity.description: A Shape_element_relationship specifies a relationship between two Shape_element objects.

explicit.name: relating
explicit.description: specifies the first of the two Shape_element objects related by a Shape_element_relationship.

explicit.name: related
explicit.description: specifies the second of the two Shape_element objects related by a Shape_element_relationship.

explicit.name: description
explicit.description: specifies additional information about the Shape_element_relationship.

explicit.name: relation_type
explicit.description: specifies the meaning of the relationship.
